title: Peanut Butter and Jelly
instruction: Put peanut butter on one slice of bread, jelly on another
note: Cinnamon raisin bagels work well with this

title: Jasmine Rice
instruction: Use one cup water to one cup rice in instant pot, high pressure for 4 minutes, natural release

title: Hot Dogs
instruction: Microwave for 50 seconds on power 9, place in bun, add toppings, microwave on high an additional 20 seconds
note: Each hot dog takes 10 years off your life

title: Pasta noodles
instruction: Place pot of water on stovetop heated to hi until water boils, add pasta. Cook 10 -15 minutes. Drain Water
note: Pesto, marinara, alfredo, butter it's all good baby.

title: Oatmeal
instruction: Add 1 & 3/4 cup water and 1 cup water to pot, bring to boil. Lower heat to medium, cook for 5 minutes
note: Add trail mix and brown sugar if you feel like it
